title: Emmerdale spoilers: Lydia discovers the identity of her secret benefactor?
text:
Lydia Hart (Karen Blick) hasn’t had the easiest of years in Emmerdale, but she could be set for more heartache in the coming episodes, as Mandy’s (Lisa Riley) interfering could well cost her an opportunity to discover the identity of her mysterious benefactor.

Never one to miss an opportunity to meddle, Mandy is determined to find out who Lydia’s secret benefactor is, and thus she pays a visit to the solicitor — with Vinny (Bradley Johnson) in tow — and refuses to leave until she learns the truth.

The solicitor is about to reveal this information, but he stops when he cops on to who Mandy truly is. Knowing that she’s caught out, she hightails it out of there. However, when Mandy and Vinny reveal to the Dingles what happened, their family turn their backs on them for attempting to ruin Lydia’s chances of discovering who it was who left her the cash.

Mandy and Vinny are left incredibly guilty over what’s transpired, so the next day, they come up with a plan to rectify the situation. Putting her plan into fruition, Mandy begins to gather tools for a break-in!

Vinny tells Lydia and Sam (James Hooton) that Mandy’s going to break into the solicitor’s office. However, they’re horrified as a result, and resolve to stop her before she does anything stupid. They successfully manage to catch up with her before she breaks in but Mandy’s not for backing down, and thus comes up with another idea.

Later, Mandy — with Vinny, Lydia and Sam all in tow — enter the solicitors office, but they pose as Health & Safety inspectors. Upon doing so, they manage to gain entry to the office!

Afterwards, they search for the appropriate file — hoping to find the identity of Lydia’s benefactor inside said file — but a security guard catches them in the act.

What will transpire?

What’s more, are Lydia’s chances of finding out who her secret benefactor is well and truly blown?
